channel.title: Diary of a reverse-engineer - Amat "acez" Cama

item.title: Corrupting the ARM Exception Vector Table
item.description:
Introduction

A few months ago, I was writing a Linux kernel exploitation challenge on ARM in an attempt to learn about kernel exploitation and I thought I'd explore things a little. I chose the ARM architecture mainly because I thought it would be fun to look at. This article is â€¦
